caption.title: Change in waterbird habitat suitability per guild.
caption.p: We show the effect predicted for three different scenarios with changes of 10%, 30%, and 50% in the main environmental predictors (see Methods). Colours denote the guild and ellipses summarize the distribution of species per guild by considering the variance/covariance matrix. We show the Standard Ellipses corrected for small sample sizes (SEAc) using the R-package SIAR (Parnell et al. 2008). Numeration as in Table 2.
